description: This file contains the definition of the EventWaitHelper class, which provides a utility for testing purposes to wait for device events, utilizing Java concurrency mechanisms like CountDownLatch.

classes.name: EventWaitHelper
classes.description: A utility class used in testing to wait for events from a device, using a CountDownLatch to synchronize.

methods.name: waitForEvent
methods.description: Waits for the specified amount of milliseconds for an event to occur; fails the test if timeout occurs.

methods.name: notifyWaiters
methods.description: Signals waiting threads that an event has occurred.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the internal latch to a new CountDownLatch for reuse.
